casebody.data:
State
v.
Van Hook 1987-1159 Supreme Court of Ohio. July 6, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On appellant's renewed motion for stay of execution. Appellee shall file a response, if any, to the renewed motion for stay of execution no later than 9:00 a.m. on Tuesday, July 10, 2018.
